item.title: Discover Caltech: Lecture on Information Theory
item.description: Context DiscoTech (Discover Caltech) was a 2 day event, where I had the chance to visit Caltech. There, I attended a mock lecture on information theory by Dr. Michelle Effros. I found it interesting enough for me to share here! Information Theory Basic Ideas of Information Theory Focuses on 2 questions: How to represent information How to transfer information Need to predict unpredictable events to do so Predicting Unpredictable Events Imagine you want be a psychic
